title: TheSage 3.0 RC1
description:
TheSage&#039;s English Dictionary and Thesaurus is a FREE professional software package that integrates a complete dictionary and multifaceted thesaurus of the English language into a single and powerful language reference system.

This torrent allows you to LEGALLY download the lastest release (3.0 RC1).

Version
3.0.16.1718.RC1	

Released
July 30th, 2008	

Size
16.7 MB
	
OS
Windows XP/Vista (9X/2K no longer supported)	

Notes	
- No installer provided. 
- Unzip and run from anywhere (fully portable). 
- Side-by-side use with previous versions of TheSage is safe. 
- No documentation in RC1. 	

Features:	
- Everything TheSage 1.x.x had and... 
- Up-to-date database. 
- Phonetic transcriptions. 
- Text-to-Speech. 
- Definition/example concordancer. 
- Online search. 
- Phonetic wildcard search. 
- &#039;As you type&#039; tool. 
- Similarity tool. 
- Spell-/sounds-like assistant. 
- Customization options galore. 	

Disabled in RC1	
- Hotkey (word capture). 
- User dictionary. 
- Check for updates. 	

And 2.x.x?	
TheSage 2.x.x grew to some dozen utilities that, while useful for research (ours, in particular), were unsuitable for public release. 

After much going back and forth, a decision was made to abandon the 1.x.x/2.x.x codebase and to design 3.x.x from scratch. 

Let us know what you think.
